product_name: The North Face Mazino Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Mazino Rain Jacket for men is waterproof and breathable and fits handily into your pack; what's cool about it is the topo print that shows through certain color choices. HyVent(R) 2.5-layer nylon fabric is seam sealed, waterproof/breathable and windproof. Storm Blue and TNF Black colors feature a clear outer shell with see-through hexagonal topo print; Balsam Blue color has hex topo print on the inside. Adjustable hood and hem cinch cord seal out weather. The North Face Mazino Rain Jacket for men has pit-zips that let you vent body moisture quickly. Zippered hand pockets; jacket stows in its own pocket.
short_description: The North Face Mazino Rain Jacket for men is waterproof and breathable and fits handily into your pack; what's cool about it is the topo print that shows through certain color choices.
